candidates.title: Simplify rendering and improve parameter handling in OpenAPI generator
candidates.body: Refactor the rendering logic for paths and enhance parameter management within the OpenAPI generator. Update dependencies and remove outdated headers to streamline the codebase.

candidates.title: Fix various issues and enhance OpenAPI support
candidates.body: Addressed issues with the `oneOf` discriminator and empty types, improved serialization with `serde_with`, and added support for headers in the OpenAPI generation process. Updated dependencies and bumped the version to 0.7.0.

candidates.title: Refactor code into separate crates and improve structure
candidates.body: Split the codebase into multiple crates for better organization, perform general code cleanup, and address issues with the `allOf` functionality.

candidates.title: Update dependencies and enhance allOf schema conversion logic
candidates.body: Upgrade several dependencies and improve the logic for converting allOf schemas by recursively collecting properties and required fields, ensuring a more accurate schema representation.

candidates.title: Add visibility control for generated types and improve code generation
candidates.body: Introduce visibility control for generated types, allowing users to specify the visibility level (public, crate, or file-private) during code generation. Clean up the codebase to enhance readability and maintainability. Update version to 0.5.0.

candidates.title: Refactor schema graph and utilities for improved encapsulation and code organization
candidates.body:
- Changed visibility of `SchemaGraph` and its methods to `pub(crate)` to limit access to the module.
- Introduced `extract_ref_from_obj_ref` method to streamline reference extraction from `ObjectOrReference`.
- Simplified dependency collection logic in `collect_dependencies` by removing the work queue and using direct recursion.
- Updated `doc_comment_lines` utility function to `pub(crate)` for consistency.
- Replaced `CodeGenerator` and `SchemaConverter` with `Orchestrator` in `main.rs` for better code generation flow.
- Enhanced cycle detection reporting in the main function.
- Adjusted tests to reflect changes in visibility for generated enums.

candidates.title: [bug] Refactor schema dependency collection to use iterative approach
candidates.body:
- Updated `collect_dependencies` method in `schema_graph.rs` to use an iterative approach with a work queue and visited set, preventing stack overflow on deeply nested schemas.
- Modified the main file to adjust import order for better readability.
- Enhanced reserved identifiers handling in `reserved.rs` by introducing a sanitization function and improving the logic for converting names to valid Rust identifiers.
- Added comprehensive tests for field and type name conversions, ensuring correct handling of reserved keywords and negative prefixes.
- Introduced integration tests for round-trip serialization/deserialization using Serde, validating generated code against OpenAPI specifications.

candidates.title: feat: update dependencies and enhance code generation
candidates.body:
- Bump version of `oas3-gen` to 0.2.0 and update dependencies in `Cargo.toml`.
- Remove `futures` and related packages from `Cargo.lock`.
- Add `uuid` and `indexmap` dependencies.
- Refactor `generator.rs` to include new fields for `FieldDef` and `TypeRef`, such as `read_only`, `write_only`, `deprecated`, `multiple_of`, and `unique_items`.
- Implement logic to handle `unique_items` in array types and adjust type generation accordingly.
- Update `reserved.rs` to sanitize schema names for valid Rust identifiers.
- Modify `main.rs` to build a type usage map for better code generation.

candidates.title: Add chrono support for serde_json date/time parsing
candidates.body: Introduce chrono for improved date and time parsing in serde_json.

chosen_pr.title: Add chrono support for serde_json date/time parsing
chosen_pr.body: Introduce chrono for improved date and time parsing in serde_json.

chosen_detail.title: Add chrono support for serde_json date/time parsing
chosen_detail.body: Introduce chrono for improved date and time parsing in serde_json.
